relationships.description: The Quidditch World Cup is hosted by the Bulgarian minister, as indicated by their presence at the event.
The Irish team participates in the Quidditch World Cup, performing a lap of honor.
Bagman comments on the event, as indicated by his shouting and roaring.
Harry is a spectator at the Quidditch World Cup, as indicated by his presence in the stands.
Cornelius Fudge receives the golden cup from two panting wizards, indicating that he is a recipient of the Quidditch World Cup.
The Bulgarian team participates in the Quidditch World Cup, as indicated by their presence at the event.
The Top Box is the location where the Quidditch World Cup is being held.
